text: Samuel Edward-Cook is an English actor, known for his roles as Walter Storey in the BBC drama series Land Girls (2009), as Danny Whizz-Bang in the BBC drama series Peaky Blinders (2013), and as DC Steve Beckton in the ITV drama series Innocent (2018). ==Filmography== ===Television=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
